channel.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
channel.description:
If Runescape decided to take the "classic" aproach with the old RS2, about the 474 revision (Godswords included but before .G.E.) Wild is there. Everything we used to know and love, and they won't add any graphical [b]or[/b] game update that would be close to the current Runescape. Only thing is you wouldn't need an account that was created back then, anyone can join and play. One problem, it's a different subscription. Would you argue back for the $5/month+ sub, or with the $7.50 (what ever they are now), or what if they imposed a higher subscription amount due to them having to put up more servers to host this (even though more players will probably go to this game, and quit RSPS).
/discuss

item.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Acorn_:

I’d pay anywhere from 5-10$ and probably quit RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I remember playing on Runescape when I was a kid back in '06 for hours and hours each day. I was friends with pretty much everyone and that was the one place I could feel cool and accepted in. I had my first girlfriend on Runescape when I was in 4th grade, and then I later found out she was in 8th and I bragged about having an older girlfriend (before she broke up with me because of the age difference) to my IRL friends who also played xD I also remember in 6th grade, me and my best friend would write stories about Runescape adventures in Language Arts… Ahh I could go on for hours.
sigh I miss being a kid :<

Read full topic
item.source: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)

item.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:22, topic:424245”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=526902.msg3839414#msg3839414 date=1323125572]

Think about how long 18 99s it would take to get without
-a mass amount of players (could actually open up trees, but w\e)
-G.E.
-overpowered weapons
-unstable economy
-foolish players (noobs, which I feel has a different meaning then compared to now)
-Cocky assholes

A lot of time, making it show when you have a 99 you’re powerful, not a noob.
[/quote]

And you don’t even have a skillcape. You either have to equip something, be high level, or make them go to the highscores. Or just be Zezima.[/quote]
Highscores, L2highscorelookup

Read full topic

item.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:14, topic:424245”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=526902.msg3839377#msg3839377 date=1323124829]
Looks kinda fun, but boring at the same time, i think it was the most fun on runescape around 06 when i started.
[/quote]

What are you talking about? This looks like 1000x more fun then what they have right now. I can play this for endless hours. The current runescape I can’t play for longer than 2 minutes.[/quote]
Absolutely this.

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:15, topic:424245”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=526902.msg3839389#msg3839389 date=1323125039]

Looks kinda fun, but boring at the same time, i think it was the most fun on runescape around 06 when i started.

What are you talking about? This looks like 1000x more fun then what they have right now. I can play this for endless hours. The current runescape I can’t play for longer than 2 minutes.
[/quote]
Sadly this is true, I could get on Runescape back in '06 and lose track of time playing, I didn’t care about anything else. It was so damn fun, best game in my childhood.[/quote]

Even walking around in the woods trying to find the cool castle place (Falador) for hours and hours was fun.

item.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

reyx7:

I’d prefer to play rs2 beta. Here’s some nostalgia:

Not that far, I liked it to a point.

[quote=“The Outsider, post:7, topic:424245”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=526902.msg3839342#msg3839342 date=1323124259]
I would pay $10 a month if they went back to the classic Rs I loved. Maybe branch it off as (Rs2) and continue this version as RuneScape Relms or RuneScape 3, but you know, same thing they did with classic.

[/quote]
I really don’t know why they couldn’t just call it RuneScape 3 and leave Rs2 as it was on a separate server, like RSC. You would of course need membership to play…

But then look on the flip side, everyone would want to play Rs2 and as they would not be wanting to have a lot of worlds dedicated to Rs2, it would just be too much.

Realistically they wouldn’t and couldn’t host RSC, Rs2 and Rs3 all in one go. Although I hate to admit it, that’s the truth. :([/quote]
They could, which is why I said it would probably be a separate membership fee.

Read full topic
item.source: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)

item.title: How much would you pay for Runescape? (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

I would pay $10 a month if they went back to the classic Rs I loved. Maybe branch it off as (Rs2) and continue this version as RuneScape Relms or RuneScape 3, but you know, same thing they did with classic.

I really don’t know why they couldn’t just call it RuneScape 3 and leave Rs2 as it was on a separate server, like RSC. You would of course need membership to play…

But then look on the flip side, everyone would want to play Rs2 and as they would not be wanting to have a lot of worlds dedicated to Rs2, it would just be too much.

Realistically they wouldn’t and couldn’t host RSC, Rs2 and Rs3 all in one go. Although I hate to admit it, that’s the truth.
@reyx7: MDP.

Read full topic
